io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.util

Class Language

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.util.Language

  • @ThreadSafe
public class Language
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper class to allow multiple GUI classes to share a ResourceBundle that contains the program's language file. It uses thread-safe singleton instantiation to allow itself to be accessed by all classes in the program.

    For maximum effectiveness, this class should be instantiated for the first time in the Main thread prior to GUI creation. This allows the program to have an opportunity to set the language based on past user preference. Unless otherwise instructed, this class calls on the default language resource file after its first instantiation.

    THREAD SAFETY: This class, as annotated below, is thread-safe. The ResourceBundle is synchronized on this class's intrinsic lock. Future edits and any client-side locking should maintain this synchronization policy.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Craig

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Language getInstance()
      Returns a shared instance of this Language module using a thread-safe Singleton instantiation.
      java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key)
      Wrapper method for the getString() method for ResourceBundle, which returns the String from the resource properties file that matches the key parameter.
      void setLocale(java.util.Locale locale)
      Sets the Locale of the ResourceBundle based on a chosen language and country.
      void setLocale(java.lang.String language, java.lang.String country)
      Sets the Locale of the ResourceBundle based on a chosen language and country.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Language getInstance()
        Returns a shared instance of this Language module using a thread-safe Singleton instantiation.
        Returns:
        the shared instance of this class.

      • setLocale

        public void setLocale(java.lang.String language,
                      java.lang.String country)
        Sets the Locale of the ResourceBundle based on a chosen language and country. If a user properties file has been linked to this class, the file is updated with the Locale information.
        Parameters:
        language - the language of the Locale.
        country - the country of the Locale.

      • setLocale

        public void setLocale(java.util.Locale locale)
        Sets the Locale of the ResourceBundle based on a chosen language and country. If a user properties file has been linked to this class, the file is updated with the Locale information.
        Parameters:
        locale - the new Locale to be set.

      • getString

        public java.lang.String getString(java.lang.String key)
        Wrapper method for the getString() method for ResourceBundle, which returns the String from the resource properties file that matches the key parameter.
        Parameters:
        key - the property key of the String to be returned from the resource.
        Returns:
        the String to be returned from the resource.
